data.message: Implement fail-closed safety verification: Built S9 invariant: System now refuses to operate if safety gates are missing/modified. Created userpromptsubmit.py with verification logic, test-fail-closed.py for validation. All tests pass. Updated threat model with 9 invariants.
data.outcome: Built S9 invariant: System now refuses to operate if safety gates are missing/modified. Created userpromptsubmit.py with verification logic, test-fail-closed.py for validation. All tests pass. Updated threat model with 9 invariants.
